name: Looper (Angusss)
description:
Can you get to all 4 stages?

Controls;

  • Switch track with either: a, d, left-arrow, right-arrow
  • select track: 1, 2, 3
  • exit: esc

Change speed, difficulty, and volume in the settings

Music:
